message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $11,000?  I'm confident this price is still a good deal for you, considering the value you've placed on the product.

I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750? I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
